channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024031024
item.description:
Report X-2024031024

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-18
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS DISCOVERED ON THE PICKOFF. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS AND TAKEN TO THE DMP. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS.

item.title: Report X-2024030729
item.description:
Report X-2024030729

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: SEEKONK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found on its side on truck. Placed into spill bin and brought to QA cage for further processing. DescribePack: Cap loosened allowing liquid to leak DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Placed upright in spill bin to prevent further spillage.

item.title: Report I-2024020043
item.description:
Report I-2024020043

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: BOSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 02/06/2024 this shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the OHL BOS Service Center, 420 E Street, Boston, MA 02127. Transportation by road has been confirmed.
